long_description: This carrying case protects your valuable Coleman gas lantern from bumps and scrapes while in storage or during transport. Injection-molded polyethylene construction is lightweight and yet durable; interior is shaped to fit the lantern for a secure fit when closed. Oversize carry handle is easy to grab; storage room in base holds extra mantles or other small items. Fits lantern models 285, 286, 288, 214, and several other older liquid fuel lanterns.
short_description: This carrying case protects your valuable Coleman gas lantern from bumps and scrapes while in storage or during transport.
